items.sentence: Tom finally overcame his shyness and asked Mary to go out with him.
Tom had the annoying habit of hardly ever answering email messages.
Have you thought about what time of year you want to take a cruise?
Tom thought that the amulet would one day protect him from witches.
Tom told Mary that he was planning to stay in Boston until October.
You\'re the only person I know besides myself who likes to do that.
Hopefully, everyone will stay and help me clean up after the party.
Tom used the money he stole from Mary to buy himself a new bicycle.
Tom waited until Mary was out of earshot before he started talking.
Tom cut Mary off before she could say anything about what happened.
